 It's Selim.

ĐẾN ĐÂY NÀO, BÀN ĐÃ CHUẨN BỊ RỒI.

-No, that wouldn't be okay. -Go.

We're gonna be so rich. Our lives are gonna change forever.

pa: Yeah. She should do it.

I'm waiting to wear it again someday.
